info.title: DnsManagementClient
info.description: Client for managing DNS zones and record.

put.description: Creates a RecordSet within a DNS zone.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: zoneName
parameters.description: The name of the zone without a terminating dot.

parameters.name: recordType
parameters.description: The type of DNS record.

parameters.name: relativeRecordSetName
parameters.description: The name of the RecordSet, relative to the name of the zone.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: The etag of RecordSet.

parameters.name: If-None-Match
parameters.description: Defines the If-None-Match condition. Set to '*' to force Create-If-Not-Exist. Other values will be ignored.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the CreateOrUpdate operation.

delete.description: Removes a RecordSet from a DNS zone.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: zoneName
parameters.description: The name of the zone without a terminating dot.

parameters.name: recordType
parameters.description: The type of DNS record.

parameters.name: relativeRecordSetName
parameters.description: The name of the RecordSet, relative to the name of the zone.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: Defines the If-Match condition. The delete operation will be performed only if the ETag of the zone on the server matches this value.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: zoneName
parameters.description: The name of the zone without a terminating dot.

parameters.name: recordType
parameters.description: The type of DNS record.

parameters.name: relativeRecordSetName
parameters.description: The name of the RecordSet, relative to the name of the zone.

get.description: Lists the RecordSets of a specified type in a DNS zone.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group that contains the zone.

parameters.name: zoneName
parameters.description: The name of the zone from which to enumerate RecordsSets.

parameters.name: recordType
parameters.description: The type of record sets to enumerate.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Query parameters. If null is passed returns the default number of zones.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The filter to apply on the operation.

get.description: Lists all RecordSets in a DNS zone.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group that contains the zone.

parameters.name: zoneName
parameters.description: The name of the zone from which to enumerate RecordSets.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Query parameters. If null is passed returns the default number of zones.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The filter to apply on the operation.

put.description: Creates a DNS zone within a resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: zoneName
parameters.description: The name of the zone without a terminating dot.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: The etag of Zone.

parameters.name: If-None-Match
parameters.description: Defines the If-None-Match condition. Set to '*' to force Create-If-Not-Exist. Other values will be ignored.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the CreateOrUpdate operation.

delete.description: Removes a DNS zone from a resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: zoneName
parameters.description: The name of the zone without a terminating dot.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: Defines the If-Match condition. The delete operation will be performed only if the ETag of the zone on the server matches this value.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: zoneName
parameters.description: The name of the zone without a terminating dot.

get.description: Lists the DNS zones within a resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Query parameters. If null is passed returns the default number of zones.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The filter to apply on the operation.

get.description: Lists the DNS zones within a resource group.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Query parameters. If null is passed returns the default number of zones.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The filter to apply on the operation.

ipv4Address.description: Gets or sets the IPv4 address of this A record in string notation.

ipv6Address.description: Gets or sets the IPv6 address of this AAAA record in string notation.

preference.description: Gets or sets the preference metric for this record.

exchange.description: Gets or sets the domain name of the mail host, without a terminating dot.

nsdname.description: Gets or sets the name server name for this record, without a terminating dot.

ptrdname.description: Gets or sets the PTR target domain name for this record without a terminating dot.

priority.description: Gets or sets the priority metric for this record.

weight.description: Gets or sets the weight metric for this this record.

port.description: Gets or sets the port of the service for this record.

target.description: Gets or sets the domain name of the target for this record, without a terminating dot.

value.description: Gets or sets the text value of this record.

cname.description: Gets or sets the canonical name for this record without a terminating dot.

host.description: Gets or sets the domain name of the authoritative name server, without a temrinating dot.

email.description: Gets or sets the email for this record.

serialNumber.description: Gets or sets the serial number for this record.

refreshTime.description: Gets or sets the refresh value for this record.

retryTime.description: Gets or sets the retry time for this record.

expireTime.description: Gets or sets the expire time for this record.

minimumTTL.description: Gets or sets the minimum TTL value for this record.

TTL.description: Gets or sets the TTL of the records in the RecordSet.

ARecords.description: Gets or sets the list of A records in the RecordSet.

AAAARecords.description: Gets or sets the list of AAAA records in the RecordSet.

MXRecords.description: Gets or sets the list of MX records in the RecordSet.

NSRecords.description: Gets or sets the list of NS records in the RecordSet.

PTRRecords.description: Gets or sets the list of PTR records in the RecordSet.

SRVRecords.description: Gets or sets the list of SRV records in the RecordSet.

TXTRecords.description: Gets or sets the list of TXT records in the RecordSet.

CNAMERecord.description: Gets or sets the CNAME record in the RecordSet.

SOARecord.description: Gets or sets the SOA record in the RecordSet.

RecordSetProperties.description: Represents the properties of the records in the RecordSet.

etag.description: Gets or sets the ETag of the RecordSet.

properties.description: Gets or sets the properties of the RecordSet.

RecordSet.description: Describes a DNS RecordSet (a set of DNS records with the same name and type).

value.description: Gets or sets information about the RecordSets in the response.

nextLink.description: Gets or sets the continuation token for the next page.

RecordSetListResult.description: The response to a RecordSet List operation.

maxNumberOfRecordSets.description: Gets or sets the maximum number of record sets that can be created in this zone.

numberOfRecordSets.description: Gets or sets the current number of record sets in this zone.

ZoneProperties.description: Represents the properties of the zone.

etag.description: Gets or sets the ETag of the zone that is being updated, as received from a Get operation.

properties.description: Gets or sets the properties of the zone.

value.description: Gets or sets information about the zones in the response.

nextLink.description: Gets or sets the continuation token for the next page.

ZoneListResult.description: The response to a Zone List or ListAll operation.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
